name: Monster Chef (itch) (jmguillen)
description:
Monster Chef is a VR game prototype developed by Sweet Manager Team for a college project.

In Monster Chef, you are tasked with delivering the orders that your clients will demand by cooking and mixing in a VR space.

  • Lead Designer/Lead Programmer - José Miguel Guillén Fernández
  • Lead 3D Artist - Celia Méndez Pedralva
  • 3D Artist/Designer/Level Designer - Agustí García Vila
  • 3D Artist/Designer/Animation - Andrea Schöniger
  • 3D Artist/Level Designer - Alejandro Martínez de Madrid Guijarro
  • 3D Artist/Level Designer - Mónica García Contreras
  • 3D Artist - Tomás Moltó Alfonso
  • Programmer - Guillem Cerdà Martí
  • Programmer - Lleïr Diego Gutiérrez
  • Music (Main Menu)- José Cebrián Forner
  • Love & Support - Francisco Carrasco Girbes
Concept by Alejandro Martínez de Madrid Guijarro.
